short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turbocharge your job search. AI-powered automation for smarter applications. Elevate your career now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-Apply for 3,000 Jobs Every Month and Land an Interview Every Day!
Say goodbye to the tedious job application process. We handle it all for you!

Our smart system finds jobs that match your resume, fills out applications, and submits them on platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed—all within minutes.

How It Works:
1️⃣ Install the extension and upload your resume.
2️⃣ Hit Auto-Apply and let us apply to 100 jobs a day for you!
📽️ Watch how it works: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tTtIukwSELk

🌎 US & Canada Focus: Currently supporting job searches in the US and Canada, with 🔜 Australia and the UK coming soon!

Why Choose Us?
✅ Tailored Applications: We customize your resume and cover letter for each job.
✅ Exclusive Jobs: Roles direct from employers with 10x less competition.
✅ Job Tracker: Keep all your applications organized.
✅ Expert Help: Get professional advice on resumes and interviews.

🆘 Need Support?
We’re here to help! Contact us at support@jobautopilot.com.

🌟 Stay Connected: Follow us on LinkedIn for tips and updates https://www.linkedin.com/company/JobAutopilot-com/
